## Container.count() method

Return a number indicating the length of a matched key in the repository.

If no key is provided, returns the length of the repository.

Signature:

```typescript
count(key?: string): number;
```

Decorators:

`@bind`

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type   | Description |
| --------- | ------ | ----------- |
| key       | string | search key  |

Returns:

number

count of items
